CARDINAL . Article CARDINAL provides that “ [ t]he parties have the right to have the ruling of the court in respect of their claims and proposals within a reasonable time ” and , further , that “ [ PERSON is incumbent upon the court to conduct the proceedings without undue delay ... ”

CARDINAL . Articles CARDINAL , CARDINAL and CARDINAL of this Code incriminate “ abuse of office ” ( zloupotreba službenog položaja ) , “ judicial malfeasance ” ( kršenje zakona od strane sudije ) and “ official malfeasance ” ( nesavestan rad u službi ) , respectively .
CARDINAL . The substance of Articles CARDINAL , CARDINAL and CARDINAL corresponds to that of the provisions of LAW mentioned above .

CARDINAL . Article CARDINAL § CARDINAL provides that a legal entity ( “ pravno lice ” ) , which includes the ORG , is liable for any damage caused by CARDINAL of “ its bodies ” ( “ njegov organ ” ) to a “ third person ” .

CARDINAL . Under ORG CARDINAL and CARDINAL of LAW , inter alia , anyone who has suffered fear , physical pain or mental anguish as a consequence of a breach of “ personal rights ” ( “ prava ličnosti ” ) may , depending on their duration and intensity , sue for financial compensation before the civil courts and , in addition , request other forms of redress “ which may be capable ” of affording adequate non - pecuniary satisfaction .
